channel.title: Evening Sketches [Album] - By NJNL [Chill]
channel.description:
The twelve songs that make up this album are in chronological order of when each Auxy project was created. I think of each track as a page in an “audio sketchbook” that I would work on to wind down for the evening. Hence the album title.
https://soundcloud.com/noahleaman/sets/evening-sketches
I have very little knowledge of all the sub-genres out there for electronic music. I don’t really know which genre these tracks fit into. Most tracks are rhythmic, layered, and moody.
Thanks for listening.
[headphones recommended]
